title: Part 1
subtitle: Invocations

title: Part 2
subtitle: Preparations for Sri Rama's installation as the Prince Regent of Ayodhya; the godís concern over the same and their approaching Goddess Sarasvati for help

title: Part 3
subtitle: Sarasvati perverts the mind of Manthara (a handmaid of queen Kaikeyi); a dialogue between Kaikeyi and Manthara

title: Part 4
subtitle: Kaikeyi enters the sulking-chamber

title: Part 5
subtitle: Dialogue between king Dasaratha and Kaikeyi; Dasaratha's lamentation; Sumantra goes to the palace and, returning from it, sends Sri Rama to His father

title: Part 6
subtitle: Dialogue between Sri Rama and mother Kaikeyi

title: Part 7
subtitle: Dialogue between Sri Rama and His father; the sadness of the people of Ayodhya; their remonstrances with Kaikeyi

title: Part 8
subtitle: Dialogue between Sri Rama and mother Kausalya

title: Part 9
subtitle: Dialogue between Sita and Sri Rama

title: Part 10
subtitle: Dialogue between Sri Rama, Kausalya and Sita

title: Part 11
subtitle: Dialogue between Sri Rama and Laksmana

title: Part 12
subtitle: Dialogue between Laksmana and mother Sumitra

title: Part 13
subtitle: Sri Rama, Laksmana and Sita call on king Dasaratha to take leave of him; Dasaratha's advice to Sita

title: Part 14
subtitle: Sri Rama, Sita and Laksmana proceed to the woods and slip past the citizens buried in slumber

title: Part 15
subtitle: Sri Rama's arrival at srngaverapura; the Nisada chiefís services

title: Part 16
subtitle: Dialogue between Laksmana and the Nisada; Sumantraís dialogue with Sri Rama and Sita and his returning to Ayodhya

title: Part 17
subtitle: The boatman's love and the passage across the Ganga

title: Part 18
subtitle: Arrival at Prayaga and dialogue between Sri Rama and the sage Bharadvaja; the love of the people inhabiting the bank of the Yamuna

title: Part 19
subtitle: The episode of an ascetic

title: Part 20
subtitle: Sri Rama greets the Yamuna; love of the villagers

title: Part 21
subtitle: Dialogue between Sri Rama and the sage Valmiki

title: Part 22
subtitle: Sri Rama takes up His abode at Citrakuta; the services of the Kolas and Bhilas

title: Part 23
subtitle: Sumantra returns to Ayodhya and finds the city a picture of grief

title: Part 24
subtitle: Dialogue between king Dasaratha and Sumantra, Dasaratha's passing away

title: Part 25
subtitle: The sage Vasistha sends envoys to call Bharata

title: Part 26
subtitle: Arrival and lamentation of Bharata and Satrughna

title: Part 27
subtitle: Dialogue between Bharata and mother Kausalya and king Dasaratha's cremation

title: Part 28
subtitle: Dialogue between the sage Vasistha and Bharata; Bharata prepares for a journey to Citrakuta in order to bring Sri Rama back to Ayodhya

title: Part 29
subtitle: Departure of Bharata and Satrughna with the citizens of Ayodhya to the woods

title: Part 30
subtitle: The Nisada's suspicion and precautions

title: Part 31
subtitle: Bharata's meeting and dialogue with the Nisada chief; the love of Bharata and the citizens of Ayodhya for Sri Rama

title: Part 32
subtitle: Bharata's arrival at Prayaga and dialogue between Bharata and the sage Bharadvaja

title: Part 33
subtitle: Bharadvaja shows hospitality to Bharata

title: Part 34
subtitle: Dialogue between Indra and his preceptor (the sage Brhaspati)

title: Part 35
subtitle: Bharata on his way to Citrakuta

title: Part 36
subtitle: Sitas dream; the Kolas and Kiratas bring news of Bharataís arrival to Sri Rama; Sri Rama's concern at the report; Laksmana's outburst of passion

title: Part 37
subtitle: Sri Rama admonishes Laksmana and dwells on Bharataís greatness

title: Part 38
subtitle: Bharata takes a dip in the Mandakini and arrives at Citrakuta; Bharata and others meet one another, mourn the kingís death and perform his Sraddha (obsequies)

title: Part 39
subtitle: Hospitality of the foresters towards Bharata and his party; Kaikeyi's remorse

title: Part 40
subtitle: Vasistha's speech

title: Part 41
subtitle: Dialogue between Sri Rama, Bharata and others

title: Part 42
subtitle: King Janakaís arrival at Citrakuta; the Kolas and Kiratas offer presents to the visitors and all meet one another

title: Part 43
subtitle: Dialogue between queens Kausalya and Sunayana (king Janaka's wife); Sita's amiability

title: Part 44
subtitle: Dialogue between king Janaka and his wife; Bharata's glory

title: Part 45
subtitle: Dialogue between king Janaka and Bharata; Indra's anxiety; Goddess Sarasvati's admonition to Indra

title: Part 46
subtitle: Dialogue between the sage Vasistha, Sri Rama and Bharata

title: Part 47
subtitle: Bharata deposits the sacred waters; his perambulation through Citrakuta

title: Part 48
subtitle: Dialogue between Sri Rama and Bharata; the gift of sandals; Bharata's farewell

title: Part 49
subtitle: Returning to Ayodhya, Bharata enthrones the sandals and takes up his residence at Nandigrama; the virtue of listening to Bharata's story
